#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n--){
               int a,b,c,i=0,f=0;
               //cout<<"Enter a: ";
               cin>>a;
              // cout<<"Enter b: ";
               cin>>b;
               vector<int> one;
               std::vector<int>::iterator it;
               
               while(i<b){
                       //   cout<<"i : "<<i<<" "<<"b : "<<b<<endl;
                        it=one.begin();  
                        cin>>c;
                        one.insert(it,c); 
                        i++;  
               }
              std::sort(one.begin(), one.end());
               //std::cout << "myvector contains:";
 /* for (it=one.begin(); it<one.end(); it++)
    std::cout << ' ' << *it;
  std::cout << '\n';*/
  int h=a;
  //cout<<one.size()<<endl;
  for(i=0;i<one.size();i++){
                            if(h>=one[i]){
                                          int x=one[i];
                                          //int b=a;
                                          h=x+a; //cout<<h<<endl; 
                                          }                            
                                          else{
                                               f=1;
                                               
                                               //cin>>a;
                                               break;
                                               }
                            }
                            if(f==0)
                            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
                            else
                            cout<<"No"<<endl;
                            one.erase(one.begin(),one.end());
                 }
}
